name: Facebook Pages
description: Extract engagement data from Facebook Pages with OAuth 2.0 authentication

settings.name: client_id
settings.label: Facebook App ID
settings.description: Your Facebook App ID from developers.facebook.com

settings.name: refresh_token
settings.label: Access Token
settings.description: Facebook access token (will be automatically exchanged for long-lived token)

settings.name: page_id
settings.label: Facebook Page ID
settings.description: The ID of the Facebook Page to sync data from

settings.name: start_date
settings.label: Start Date
settings.description: Date to start syncing historical data (ISO 8601 format, e.g., 2025-01-01T00:00:00Z)
